title: Influence of natural polysaccharides on the morphology and properties of hybrid vaterite microcrystals
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Nadezhda G. Balabushevich, Liliya N. Maltseva, Lyubov Y. Filatova, Daniil V. Mosievich, Pavel I. Mishin, Margarita E. Bogomiakova, Olga S. Lebedeva, Marina A. Murina, Dmitry V. Klinov, Ekaterina A. Obraztsova, Zaira F. Kharaeva, Roxalana K. Firova, Daria V. Grigorieva, Irina V. Gorudko, Oleg M. Panasenko, Elena V. Mikhalchik
